title: Welcome to CS 101!
message:
Welcome to CS 101: Introduction to Programming!

I'm excited to have you in this course. Over the next few months, we'll explore the fundamentals of programming using Python.

Getting Started

  • Review the syllabus in the Home section
  • Install Python 3.x on your computer
  • Complete the practice quiz to test your setup

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions!

Best,
Dr. Smith

title: Office Hours Update
message:
Hi everyone,

I wanted to let you know about the office hours schedule:

  • Dr. Smith: Tuesdays 2-4 PM, Room 301
  • TA Alex: Thursdays 3-5 PM, Lab 102

You can also schedule virtual office hours through the booking link in the syllabus.

title: Homework 1 Tips
message:
Homework 1 is now available! Here are some tips to help you succeed:

  1. Start early - Don't wait until the last minute
  2. Test your code - Run it with different inputs
  3. Comment your code - Explain what each section does
  4. Ask questions - Use the discussion board or office hours

Good luck!

title: Quiz 1 Reminder
message:
Reminder: Quiz 1 is due this Friday at 11:59 PM!

The quiz covers:

  • Variables and data types
  • Basic operators
  • String operations

You have 2 attempts, and your highest score will be kept. Good luck!
